LanguageData.EGO_Knife.label: Lymocyst
LanguageData.EGO_Knife.description: Amalgam Knife used by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology. Specially modified weapon charged with Cryo and Acid damages.\n\nThis modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.EGO_Knife.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.EGO_Knife.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.EGO_Knife.tools.point.label: point
